Comments_List: I learned all about analyzing circuits at a very technical/detailed level. I additionally learned about different kinds of circuits and what their purpose was as well as the theory behind them.

This course was interesting. The workload and labs were manageable and Professor Tang is a great lecturer. The textbook was a little hard, however, and hard to read because the chapters were so long. Also the labs were sometimes a little unorganized or did not work properly, however, the TAs and professor were very helpful and understanding in solving these problems.
Only take this course if it is a required class. It is so technical and in detail that it is only really helpful if it is required for your major.
